scripts.copy-bootstrap: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/* ufastauthd3_login/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/* ufastauthd3_admin/assets/
scripts.copy-jquery: cp -r node_modules/jquery/dist/* ufastauthd3_login/assets/js/ && cp -r node_modules/jquery/dist/* ufastauthd3_admin/assets/js/
scripts.copy-datatables: cp -r node_modules/datatables.net/js/ ufastauthd3_admin/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/datatables.net/types/ ufastauthd3_admin/assets/
scripts.copy-datatables-dt: cp -r node_modules/datatables.net-dt/js/ ufastauthd3_admin/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/datatables.net-dt/css/ ufastauthd3_admin/assets/ && cp -r node_modules/datatables.net-dt/types/ ufastauthd3_admin/assets/
scripts.build-assets: npm run make-dirs && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-jquery && npm run copy-datatables && npm run copy-datatables-dt
